page.title: 14OLD BUILDINGS
page.content: These are mostly in{West Tilbury. { Condovers}farm house has been restored.{The Manor House}is tumbling down although some enterprising person may restore it someday.The farm house next to it is being restored all ready. {Well House}is a pleasant cottage beside the rather over-grown pond, and {The Kings Head }survives from another century when coaches came down Turnpike Road bringing people to drink the Spa waters.These have disappeared nowadays. In Chadwell is{Sleepers}Farm.It is a white-washed cottage with a thatched roof next to the crossroads.{Daniel {Defoe}had it built there and it is where he wrote Robinson Crusoe.When he looked down over the deserted marshes perhaps he could well imagine being alone.
